participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, always looking for the bright side of things.
participant_1.background: Emily grew up in a small town and has a background in marketing. She loves connecting with people and sharing positive experiences.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and analytical, enjoys deep conversations about life.
participant_2.background: James comes from a big city and has a background in technology. He often reflects on his experiences and enjoys learning new things.
